name: Guardians of the Gods

location.name: Oakwood Village Library and Arts Centre

description:
A play about adults, for children. Performed in 11 countries, across five continents in 2025.


Sometimes adults seem like gods, powerful, protective, and kind. But they can also be unpredictable and dangerous. What adults often overlook is children's unique power, their ability to see right through them. 

This is a play about what unites children across the globe: living in a world ruled by adults. 

Written by Erik Uddenberg and directed by Gustav Deinoff, the play has been developed based on interviews with children and adults from all over the world.

name: Great Backyard Bird Count in High Park
description:
Join us with your friends and family for our Great Backyard Bird Count community science birding event! 

We'll walk through High Park identifying, learning about and counting the birds we spot. The data we collect will be submitted to eBird. 

This is a beginner and family-friendly birding event, suitable for children ages 8 and up.
